name: Growsplotion by you
description:
An interactive NFT where you can decide how the growsplotion behaves. It started as an idea on why NFTs are non changeable. They are of course non fungible but now you can be the decision maker and make it your own.

The algorithm is based on the phyllotaxis (the arrangement of leaves on a plant stem (from Ancient Greek phýllon "leaf" and táxis "arrangement") algorithm and has evolved into an animation of growing and shrinking. 

Just as a flower would fold out its petals so much that it explodes. Then the time is reversed. Forever back and forth.
